name: Curved Gaming Monitor Asus 27" (90LM0510-B01E70) - Black
origAbout: TUF Gaming VG27VQ is a 27-inch, Full HD (1920x1080), curved display with an ultrafast 165Hz refresh rate designed for professional gamers and those seeking immersive gameplay. Its impressive curved display features delivers stunning visuals from all angles with an 1500R curvature that ensures every point is equidistant to your eyes. This contributes to greater viewing comfort — even during extended use —and lets you enjoy a wide viewing angle with less distortion and colour shift when gaming and watching movies. Refresh rate and Adaptive-Sync (FreeSync™) technology, for extremely fluid gameplay without tearing and stuttering.
